2.name: The Squaw Man
2.description: A chivalrous British officer takes the blame for his cousin's embezzlement and journeys to the American West to start a new life on a cattle ranch.

4.name: Tillie's Punctured Romance
4.description: A con man from the city dupes a wealthy country girl into marriage.

5.name: Judith of Bethulia
5.description: A religious woman seeks to save her people from destruction by seducing and murdering the enemy leader, but her plans get complicated once she falls for him.

9.name: The Avenging Conscience: or 'Thou Shalt Not Kill'
9.description: Prevented from dating his sweetheart by his uncle, a young man turns his thoughts to murder.

10.name: Cinderella
10.description: Though mistreated by her cruel stepmother and stepsisters, Cinderella is able to attend the royal ball through the help of a fairy godmother.

14.name: A Florida Enchantment
14.description: A young woman discovers a seed that can make women act like men and men act like women. She decides to take one, then slips one to her maid and another to her fiancé. The fun begins.

18.name: The Million Dollar Mystery
18.description: This twenty-three episode serial told the story of a secret society called The Black Hundred and its attempts to gain control of a lost million dollars.

19.name: The Life of General Villa
19.description: The life and career of Panccho Villa from young man to revolutionary leader is chronicled.

20.name: Uncle Tom's Cabin
20.description: A black and white silent film based on Harriet Beecher Stowe's novel documenting the life and times of Uncle Tom.

21.name: Home, Sweet Home
21.description: John Howard Payne at his most miserable point in life, writes a song which becomes popular and inspires other people at some point in their lives.

26.name: The Virginian
26.description: A good-natured but chivalrous cowboy romances the local schoolmarm and leads the posse that brings a gang of rustlers, which includes his best friend, to justice.

27.description: An American sailor falls in love with a fisherman's daughter and convinces her that Jesus is more powerful than the gods who have cursed her.

28.name: Der Hund von Baskerville
